TopicTitle: How do I scroll the parts list down?

Articles.Content:
as the title asks 

I just modded the heck out of KSP and haven't played in a while 

When I sort the parts list according to manufacturer, the list extends below the screen. 

How do you scroll down or get to the next page of tabs? 

[Screenshot to clarify my dilemma](http://prntscr.com/7784ob)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-21T04:49:00Z" title="05/21/2015 04:49  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 21, 2015</time> by iDisOrder**
I'd have to say that if hovering the cursor over it and using the mouse wheel doesn't work, it might just be a problem Squad didn't consider happening.

According to Settings > Input: Game > UI:

Scroll Icons Up: Home

Scroll Icons Down: End

Does that solve your problem, or am I missing something?

> 
> According to Settings > Input: Game > UI:
> Scroll Icons Up: Home
> 
> Scroll Icons Down: End
> 
> Does that solve your problem, or am I missing something?

That refers to the staging icons on the right side.

Mouseover + scrollwheel seems to scroll the OP's list for me.

Has anyone here ever have a *DUH!?!* moment?

Holding the pointer and scrolling works.

Thanks for your help guys.
